name: spheniscidae
description:
HEAJ GameJam 2018 - Shields - 48h / 4 people

spheniscidae is a 2 to 4 players local multiplayer game, in which you play penguins that throw a baby seal at each other using their manta ray shield in order to knock the other out.

Controls  :  [Require 2 to 4 controllers]
Left Stick - Move
Right Stick - Aim your shield

Made by :
Constantin Liétard
Tanguy Gringoire
Thomas Denis
Clara Coolen
